name: JDiego Rojas
description: student of Agroindustrial Engineering at the National University of Trujillo VJ, also passionate about project management and data science.
bio_4: I was born in the beautiful Moc Chau plateau.
bio_5: My first programming language I learned was Pascal.
bio_7: I'm focusing on building eCommerce software.
bio_8: I work mostly with JS/TS technologies.
bio_16: I love playing video games, PES is my favorite one.
bio_first_job: And in 2024 I started studying data analytics and I was fascinated by it.
bio_passion: I have a passion for Python and R, statistics, mathematics and machine learning.
bio_blog_purpose: I started this blog to document and share my knowledge and experience.
lost_message: Hmm.. it seems that you're lost
return_message: But don't worry, you can find plenty of other things on my homepage.
